title: How to Open a Sandisk Cruzer U3 Drive

steps.title: Observe the flash drive, and find the little crack down the left side of the front of the drive.
steps.content: Observe the flash drive, and find the little crack down the left side of the front of the drive.

steps.title: Stick your fingernail in the middle of the crack, and then try to pull the two sides apart.
steps.content: Stick your fingernail in the middle of the crack, and then try to pull the two sides apart.

steps.title: Follow the crack, with your fingernail sliding through.
steps.content: Follow the crack, with your fingernail sliding through. When it goes to the other side, pull apart the two sides again.

steps.title: The case should come off.
steps.content: The case should come off. If not, repeat steps 2 and 3 until it comes off.

steps.title: The white slider should be on the board.
steps.content: The white slider should be on the board. Carefully, take the slider off.

steps.title: Your circuit board is there!
steps.content: Your circuit board is there! Fix, look, or break it. It depends on what you want to do with it.
